text: Isa la'i iha loka jihara kujha akhade hana, usa upara dhiraja rakho. Ate apane raba di prasasa de sahita upamam karo, suraja nikalana tom pahilam ate suraja dubana tom pahilam, ate rata di'am ghari'am vica vi usa di vadi'a'i karo. Dina de kinari'am te vi (vadi'a'i karo) tam ki tuhanu satusati mile
